channel.title: ssh on uweb browser: unlimited power
channel.description: Recent content in ssh on uweb browser: unlimited power

item.title: Text selection
item.description: Click the following links to install menus for long pressing the button "link": Search with home screen google Translate bing translate deepL The file "default.select" defines menus for selected text. If no text is selected, the menu item operates on the whole page. Each line of the file has the following format: [Name]:[mimetype]:[command line] [mimetype] specifies input/output for [command line]. It formats as "[input mimetype]/[output mimetype]". [input mimetype] can be the following:
